map.string:
Welcome to use the "1TH Pro" module. The module is set in "Main Page â†’ Sidebar â†’ 1TH Pro (below Telegram settings)"

**Disclaimer:**
- 1TH Pro module is for learning and communication only. Please delete it within 24 hours after downloading. Users must bear the risks and responsibilities brought by using this module at their own discretion. 

- 1TH Pro module can modify the behavior of the Telegram App. Users should carefully review the operation of the module and decide whether to use it at their own discretion. 
- Using 1TH Pro can cause problems such as Telegram App instability, crashes, and data loss. The authors are not responsible for any issues arising from the use of this module. 
- Developers reserve the right to update, modify, pause, and terminate the 1TH Pro module. Users should confirm the security and stability of their versions on their own. 
- The author shall not bear any responsibility for any problems caused by the use of the 1TH Pro module, and all consequences shall be borne by the user. 
- The author does not provide any technical support and solutions in any form for any problems arising from using the 1TH Pro module. 

Please carefully read the above disclaimer before using the 1TH Pro module and weigh the risks and interests yourself. Do not use it if you have any objections. If you use the 1TH Pro module, you have fully accepted this disclaimer.
ðŸš« The join request has been blocked
Are you sure you want to delete all records?
There is no external application that can handle translation
Replace strings based on regular expressions of "keywords", the principle is the same as the replacement rules of "MT Manager", but the regular expressions of the module are case sensitive
Exclude sender type â†’ sender â†’ reprinted from â†’ exclude keywords â†’ keywords
Search all messages in the topic
Detected that the software you are currently using does not support this module
The startup class was not found, it may be that this module does not support the Xposed framework you are currently using
Unable to copy classes.dex file to %1$s directory
No permission to write the %1$s path, it may be that this module does not support the current Xposed framework
You are detecting that you are using the older version of %1$s, please update %2$s to version 11.9.0 before using this module
The current custom translation source does not support the target language
Since your device does not support a language parser, the language of this message cannot be parsed
Telegram The same client uses the same account at the same time, which may cause the login identity to be invalid. This problem has nothing to do with the module.

Telegram itself has many problems. All functions in the module basically call the methods that come with Telegram. If there is a problem with the method that comes with Telegram, then the module will also have related problems (more problems with view related functions)
The message view reference group "Recent Operations" in the module is written. There are still many problems, and this problem cannot be fixed.
Share pop-up window at the bottom
When the module uses the bottom pop-up window to select a conversation, it will only take effect on the first selected conversation/topic.
The "Account Switch" in the module means that it only takes effect on the current account, and the "Function Switch" means that it takes effect on the module's functions.
The functions in the module will basically not take effect on encrypted dialogues

Searches in modules only need to include strings, not case sensitive. 
Search logic is as follows:
- Start with "+" and search only private conversation links
- Start with "@" and search only users
- Start with "*" and search only conversation ID (not required)
- Default search option title and description content
- The message interface supports any style of link search

If you view all messages from groups and channels, use Telegram message classification. When using all types, you can use the module's message type filter, and you cannot slide to load more messages when searching and filtering messages. The results displayed at the bottom: The current list message number, the search is the "Number of Messages / Total Messages" and the filtered number of messages.

After setting the default speech topic, enable viewing all topics in message form. The sent message will be sent to the topic you set, and will also be sent to the topic you set when resuming the message.

The pagination tab option in the module only supports operations on the content in the current list
Remote History/My Remote Records:
- Archive/Unarchive: Archive/Unarchive conversations that have been added to the history in the list, rather than adding all records in the current list to the history and archive/Unarchive. 
- Add to History: Add all records in the current list to the history, ignore if the record already exists
- Delete from History: Delete all conversations in the current list from History/Archived History
When deleting a recalled message, all editing records of the message will be deleted at the same time and the message will be unmarked.
When deleting a local message, all editing records of this message will be deleted at the same time.
Thank you for the reward of %s USD
Restrictions on security windows and security views
Release some Telegram Premium restrictions, cannot lift restrictions from servers
Confirm before joining the group or channel
No sharing of my mobile phone number
My phone number is not shared by default when adding a contact
Other users subscribe to the channel to join the channel accurately to seconds
Allow shared grouping conversations to be opened
Press and hold the Share Grouping option to open the specified conversation
Recommended for hidden member expression status
Hide how to add greeting view
Telegram is prohibited from checking for updates
Force an attempt to connect using IPv6
Automatic login to the official website is prohibited
Only hide the main page to create dynamic floating buttons and sidebar dynamic options
Display user nickname in conversation list title
Display Telegram open source version information
Ignore the dialog list paging unread message count
Stars is not enough to pay for renewal subscription reminder
You can copy and save messages that are prohibited from being forwarded
Use module to open tag search
If the current chat page is a topic, tag search will only search for the current topic
Delete the other party's message at the same time
Delete the Zalgo symbol in the message layout name view
View secret media with normal messages
Remove time view from sticker message layout
Keep the video mute when pressing the volume key
Disable the message prompt tone received
Statistics of ad click data are prohibited, this option may affect personalized ad recommendations
Since your device does not support language parsers, translation-related functions will be limited

Turning on this function will replace Telegram's own translation algorithm. Since the module needs to read messages, get message text, and parse message language, the translation speed will slow down.
Free translation sources have request restrictions, please do not use free translation sources to automatically translate messages
Disable the language parser for Telegram translation sources
Confirm before sending a translated message
Are you sure you want to cancel and send a translated message to the "%s" conversation?
Are you sure you want to cancel and send a translated message to the conversation in the current account "%s" group?
Are you sure you want to cancel and send a translated message to the selected **%d** conversation?
Automatically insert spaces between Chinese, half-width English, Japanese, Korean, numbers and symbols
Use built-in fonts for the system
This option overwrites text formats such as bold, italic, etc.
Remove Archived Dialogue from the list
Use specific number of members, subscriptions, or viewing instead of fuzzy numbers
User experience may be reduced on average/low performance devices, please take your own risk when using it
Skip to the next channel is prohibited
Disable vibration feedback when sliding reply
Do not actively pop up the robot keyboard
Display time accurately to seconds in conversation
Attach the specific time after the floating date
Confirm before sending a GIF or sticker
View all topics in message form
Force General topics to send messages
You need to use the /topic command to set the default speech topic first
Show username instead of mobile phone number
Display ID on the profile page
Disable the profile page and click to copy ID
Limited time is accurate to seconds

Increase the side limit of the image to 2560px. Since the default margin of the image is 1280px, the maximum margin of the image you can save depends on the maximum margin when the sender sends the image.
By default, the link preview request is disabled during the input process to prevent the server from knowing that the link is shared on Telegram.
Confirm before sending a Bot command
Click the command in the message to ask whether to send it, the robot interface will not be affected.
When editing media, display private media buttons in encrypted conversations, favorites, and robot conversations.
Only a single expression will take effect
Upload acceleration does not take effect in "slow network", such as: 2G network
Upload acceleration after closing does not take effect
Experimental function, all consequences caused by starting this function are at your own risk
Download acceleration does not take effect after closing
Maximum number of download requests (large files)
Enter â€˜delete my accountâ€™ to delete the account
If the robot does not exist, you can delete it. Otherwise, it is meaningless to delete it.
If the group is associated with a channel, an option will be added to the title bar menu
After turning on this function, the original "Forward" message option will be changed to "Forward without reference" message
Allows deletion of anti-revoked messages without deletion permission

Name: %1$s
Size: %2$s
Automatic download media: %3$s
Note: You can still download this file in the future.
Delete Telegram external directory cache only
Repeat the topic of replying to the message

- Click: Repeat message\n- Long press: Repeat message. If the message responds to another message, reply to the message replied to by this message. If the current conversation is a topic, send the repeated message to the topic where the message is located.
Disable repeat reading in the channel
- Click: Quote and repeat the message\n- Long press: Same as "repeat", but will not reply to the message
If the message is deleted, the marked record of the message will be deleted at the same time.
If you delete the message and delete the anti-revocation record, the editing record of the message will be deleted at the same time.
Press and search forward from the current message

Name: %1$s
Size: %2$s
Automatic download media: %3$s
Note: You can still download this file in the future
Are you sure you want to delete all Anti-recall records in the "%s" conversation?
Are you sure you want to delete all Anti-recall records in the current account "%s" paging?
Are you sure you want to delete all Anti-recall records in the selected **%d** conversations?
If the message content hits this rule, the message will be deleted
If the message content hits this rule, the message will be blocked from deletion, but all messages that miss this rule will be deleted
Allow the robot to withdraw messages
Anti-recall messages will not take effect on this conversation
The last time to be displayed online is accurate to seconds
Effective only when both parties turn on "online status"
Display associated channels on the group profile page
The person who blocked me, the message name displayed in gray, the avatar displayed in "ðŸ¤¡" and a gray background
Replace user information with blank names
The user's name in the message view will be replaced with the user ID
Replace the user information of "Lognant Account"
The name in the message view is gray, and the avatar is displayed as text avatar and a gray background
User profile can be displayed in line breaks
Add the current device time zone time to the end of the name, turn off this option to restore the original name
Instructions with * support reply, name, mention
/opban seconds (after less than 60 seconds, permanent ban will be blocked)
Clear group and channel "Logined Account", number of people > 3000 is invalid
* Banned and kicked out of group chat
* Only kick out of group chat
Are you sure you want to delete "%s" all messages you sent?
Encrypted messages. Only users of this module can see the encrypted messages. Recording the message editing record will record the plain text.
(If the ID is negative, the group and channel will be opened)
Replace the content of the reply message
Are you sure you want to delete all history records in the current account "%s" group?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected **%d** history?
Are you sure you want to delete all history of your "%s" account?
Are you sure to copy all the history records in the "%1$s" account to the history records of the current account?
Are you sure you want to add all conversations in the "%s" shared folder to the history?
Are you sure you want to delete the history of "%s"?
Always save the offset of the chat history
You can delete/add history by sticker pop-up menu options
Delete history when returning from the title bar
When using the return button in the title bar, the saved history of the current conversation will be deleted
Confirm before deleting history when the title bar returns
Only the subscriber to the @HelperHistoryRecord channel will take effect
Show links on private conversation profile page
Display links on all topic profile pages
Display dates in the history list
Topic ID: %1$d, Message ID: %2$d, Offset: %3$d\nUpdate time: %4$s
Are you sure you want to add the selected conversations in the "%s" shared folder to the history?
Are you sure you want to delete all message editing records in the "%s" conversation?
Are you sure you want to delete the message editing record for this message?
Are you sure you want to delete all message editing records in the current account "%s" paging?
Are you sure you want to delete all history in the selected **%d** conversations?
The messages that hit this rule will not be recorded by the module, but all messages that missed this rule will be recorded
The message hitting this rule will be recorded by the module, and the message missing will not be recorded by the module.

Editing your own messages will give priority to local messages. It is difficult for the module to obtain old messages. Secondly, the edited messages can be cancelled, but the module will not cancel the record, so it does not support recording of the messages you edited.
Robot's message Telegram will not display the "Edited" prompt. The robot may edit the message multiple times to display progress, so it is not supported to record "robot" messages.
Telegram conversations do not display the "Edited" prompt, and messages may be edited multiple times, so it is not supported to record messages from Telegram conversations.
This channel is only used to open History
Are you sure you want to cancel all tagged messages in your current account?
Are you sure you want to cancel all tagged messages in the "%s" conversation?
Are you sure you want to cancel all tagged messages in the current account "%s" paging?
Are you sure you want to uncheck all tagged messages in the **%d** conversations?
Disable videos from looping by default
Upload videos with source image quality (experiment)
The video quality cannot be manually adjusted after turning on, this function may not improve the video upload quality.
Select the playback speed expressed in percentage (%), with effective range from 20% to 300%
Set the default video playback speed
If Telegram does not record the playback speed of the current media, this speed is used as the video default playback speed
Set the default video playback quality

If Telegram does not record the image quality of the current media playback, this quality is used as the default playback quality for the video. If you set to the specified image quality, use the picture quality you set as the highest image quality. If the specified image quality does not exist, play a video with a lower image quality. If the lowest image quality video does not exist, the lowest image quality that can be played by the playback video
Set the default download quality of video

When downloading videos, if the source quality has been cached, the video will not be downloaded. Otherwise, the picture quality you set is used as the highest picture quality. If the specified picture quality does not exist, a video with a lower picture quality is downloaded. If the video with the lowest picture quality does not exist, the video can be downloaded by downloading the video.
The message will be sent directly for the first time, and the message will be sent after each delay starting from the second time.
After adding rules and opening them, searching for messages will perform corresponding operations according to the rules in the Message menu â†’ Extended menu.
Automatically set Telegram timing messages for the specified number of days, or send messages regularly. If the current time exceeds the set time, the message will be sent immediately.
How many days of timed messages are set each time
When Telegram switches to the background, automatically sends a message reply after waiting for a specified time.
Each time you open Telegram to check if the username is available, try to create a public channel if it is available
The username is not in this conversation and it means it is occupied by others
Disable the robot to open the app button
Message view avatar rounded corner size
Disable conversations to use custom wallpapers
Forbidden Groups/channels to use custom wallpapers
Forbidden Users/Robots to use custom wallpapers
The message will not be marked as read, and the historical message will be marked as read after sending the message
Forbidden to mark dynamics as read
No operation status will be sent after closing
Are you sure you want to delete all exception conversations in the current account "%s" group?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected **%d** exception conversation?
Spam messages in conversations will be hidden
No spam messages in conversations are hidden
Deleting messages in conversation will be blocked
The message can be deleted normally in the conversation
Messages received in the conversation will be listened to by the module
Can't listen to messages received in conversation
It will not be marked as read when viewing a message
The message is marked as read when viewing it
You won't be in this dynamic audience list
You will appear in this dynamic audience list
The operation status will not be sent when sending a message
The operation status will be sent when sending a message
The message will be recorded by the module when editing in the conversation
The message before editing in the conversation will not be recorded
Append a suffix when sending messages in a conversation
Only original messages will be sent in the conversation
Custom wallpapers will be displayed in the conversation
Only default wallpaper will be displayed in the conversation
Are you sure you want to delete all the rules in the "%s" grouping?
Runs only if the sender message is not empty
Save module settings to the specified directory
Recover module settings from local folder
Are you sure to initialize all settings of the module?
Backup: Automatic backup is only triggered when switching backends, you can manually click Backup. \nList: Normal number / Archive number
The backup file has failed, please check
The backup file was imported successfully
Check the status of Telegram **Data Center**
Global exception %1$d times, functional exception %2$d times, total %3$d times
All dialogue information options in the module in the demonstration mode are not visible or operational
Are you sure you want to delete all exception records?
Are you sure you want to delete all module logs?
This feature is forced to be turned on to prevent the log content from containing Xposed module information
Number of days of log storage
Are you sure you want to delete all local messages in the "%s" conversation?
Are you sure you want to delete all local messages in the "%s" group for the current account?
Are you sure you want to delete all local messages from the selected **%d** conversations?
Change these settings only if you know exactly what they do.
